Power_Siphon_Tell.help: Protean drains the power of nearby foes to recharge himself. Recharge: Slow
Power_Siphon_Tell.attackerAttackFloater: Get Away! Protean readies his Power Siphon!

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} powers up their Power Siphon!

Power_Siphon_Hit.help: Protean drains the power of nearby foes to recharge himself.

Barrage.help: You perform a quick punch that deals minor damage. Coupled with other energy punches, Barrage can Disorient a foe. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Energy_Punch.help: You perform a powerful Energy Punch that deals moderate damage. When used with other Energy Melee attacks, Energy Punch can Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Power_Blast.help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Bone_Smasher.help: A Bone Smasher attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a better chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Whirling_Hands.help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Kinetic_Shield.help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks.
Kinetic_Shield.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Kinetic_Shield.attackerHit: You Kinetic Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

Power_Shield.help: This Power Shield creates a Electro-Magnetic shield around you that can deflect non-physical attacks. Your Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks is increased as these attacks are reflected or refracted off the shield. Power Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs.
Power_Shield.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +DEF(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Power_Shield.attackerHit: You Power Shield increased you Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks.

Overload.help: You can Overload your Energy Aura and dramatically improve your defense to all attack types except Psionic Attacks. Overload also grants you high resistance to Defense Debuffs. This Energy Aura is so powerful, that it can even absorb some damage, effectively increasing your Max Hit Points, However, when Overload wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Extremely Long
Overload.shortHelp: Self +DEF(All but Psionics), +Recovery, +Max HP, Res(DeBuff DEF), +Special
Overload.attackerHit: You are Overloading your Energy Aura. You now have extreme Defense to all attacks except Psionics and your Max HP has been increased.

messages.attackerHit: {PowerName} has left you exhausted and unable to Recovery Endurance for a while!
